trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SEQ_00<tab>Maru has a crease of consternation upon his noble brow.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_TODO_00<tab>Search for the nervous Rider.
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_TODO_01<tab>Report back to Maru.
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_MARU_000_001<tab>One of our new recruits has been takin' his sweet time with his delivery...
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_MARU_000_002<tab>He ain't irresponsible, just...not the best conversationalist. You think you could check in on him an' make sure he's alright?
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_MARU_000_003<tab>He's probably loiterin' nervously around the Great Work somewhere. Give him a nudge in the right direction if he ain't makin' progress.
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_WOMAN04556_000_004<tab>B-By the Sisters! This man just snuck up on me and started shouting! What does he want? I'm terrified to ask!
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_MYSTERIOUSALCHEMIST04556_000_005<tab>This man has been standing here, squirming in silence for some time. Is he in distress?
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SHYNESSDELIVERER04556_000_010<tab>Er! Erm! ...Aaah!
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_WOMAN04556_000_011<tab>S-Stop shouting at me! Just tell me what you want and leave me be!
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SHYNESSDELIVERER04556_000_012<tab>N-No, I didn't mean─! Th-The boss always says to s-speak up, so I just─! Er!
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_A1_000_001<tab>Pause. Now take a deep breath.
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_A1_000_002<tab>You must speak confidently, man! From your diaphragm!
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_A1_000_003<tab>Eye contact is key. Steady, unblinking eye contact...
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SHYNESSDELIVERER04556_000_013<tab>Y-You got it!
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SYSTEM_100_013<tab>After several uncomfortable moments, it becomes clear that this method isn't working. Try advising him again.
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SHYNESSDELIVERER04556_000_014<tab>D-Deep breaths? O-Okay... That... Oh, that feels better... Whooo...
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SHYNESSDELIVERER04556_000_015<tab>I think I can take it from here, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>! Thanks for your help─an' tell Maru that I'll be back soon!
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SHYNESSDELIVERER04556_000_020<tab>Er... Errrrrr...
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_MYSTERIOUSALCHEMIST04556_000_021<tab>He appears to be in deep thought, but I'm not certain why he wishes I bear witness to it...
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SHYNESSDELIVERER04556_000_022<tab>I-I knew what I was gonna say... But now I can't remember nothin'... Er...
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_A2_000_001<tab>Have you a written list of your objectives?
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_A2_000_002<tab>Remember, man! Remember with sheer willpower!
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_A2_000_003<tab>Just start talking until you figure it out.
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SHYNESSDELIVERER04556_000_023<tab>Y-You got it!
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SYSTEM_100_023<tab>After several uncomfortable moments, it becomes clear that this method isn't working. Try advising him again.

TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SHYNESSDELIVERER04556_000_024<tab>Oh, th-that's right! I wrote it down, didn't I? 'Cause I knew somethin' like this might happen! Ha! I got so nervous, I even forgot that I remembered that I'd forget!
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SHYNESSDELIVERER04556_000_025<tab>Thanks, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>─I think I'll be alright! Tell Maru that I'll be back soon.
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SHYNESSDELIVERER04556_000_030<tab>I remember their name... But what did they look like again...? Oh no...
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_A3_000_001<tab>I'm sure Nidhana could point you in the right direction.
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_A3_000_002<tab>Just introduce yourself to everybody here. You're bound to remember at some point!
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_A3_000_003<tab>Start screaming their name. I'm sure <var 1A 02 /var>someone<var 1A 01 /var> will come running.
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SHYNESSDELIVERER04556_000_031<tab>I-If I could do that, I would've done it already!
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SYSTEM_100_031<tab>The nervous Rider's shoulders slump dejectedly. Try advising him again.
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SHYNESSDELIVERER04556_000_032<tab>O-Oh! I was so focused on tryin' to fix it myself, I never considered askin' for help!
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_SHYNESSDELIVERER04556_000_033<tab>Thanks, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>! I can take it from here. Tell Maru not to worry no more!
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_MARU_000_040<tab>So that's what he was up to... Thanks for steerin' him true.
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_MARU_000_041<tab>His nerves can really get the better of him, but he's been downright stubborn about helpin' out with deliveries.
TEXT_BANARK106_04556_MARU_000_042<tab>We'll keep him runnin' errands closer to home, but I hope you won't be averse to helpin' him out again, should he need it. I know it'd mean the world to him...
